title: Okay, this one is gonna be fun
body:
https://i.imgur.com/QHhTylf.png

It seems like I am not gonna farm enough tokens for my Kai'Sa skin by the middle of november and I also risk losing my account to a random suspension. I also won't be able to play with my friends for the rest of the evening.

I'd like to thank Riot Games for making my weekend enjoyable.

replies.body: I mean, submit a ticket? If you're good you're good if you're not then there's something wrong with your account bud.

> [{quoted}](name=Strawberry Milk,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8ENe3rqb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-10-27T16:59:27.942+0000)
>
> I mean, submit a ticket? If you're good you're good if you're not then there's something wrong with your account bud.

I contacted the support, obviously, and from their wording it doesn't seem like it will be resolved in one or even two data exchanges. It doesn't make the situation less stressful or frustrating and people were losing accounts to this shit before. Considering the average time it takes for them to answer the ticked, even if I am all gucci, I will be effectively banned from league for a week - a week off my Worlds 2018 pass.

Considering that my lock was not exactly grounded, I requested 29 tokens as a compensation on the 20th of november, so I have enough for a "mic drop" emote. I received them today and I think it would be _a_ fair thing to mention here.
{{sticker:katarina-love}}

Considering the questions they asked, I should be fine. Seems like my ticket has fairly high priority of that particular employee, because I got an answer in ~2.5 hours. Now it begins.

How much can we bet they will tell you that you were using some 'malicious program' and they won't tell you which one (even tho it might be something that you weren't even aware off) and you won't get your acc back?
